properties.description: Derby Libraries will be providing warm spaces with extra seating and free hot drinks to support communities with the cost of living this winter. The spaces will be available to all to relax and connect in a safe, warm, welcoming space. Library staff will be on hand to support people who want to join the library and borrow books as well as sign post people to support and trusted information on the cost of living. There will also be opportunities for people to access a busy regular programme of free activities in the libraries from family rhymetimes to adult book groups. To protect the planet and reduce the use of plastic people are encouraged to bring their own cups into libraries. Everyone is welcome to unlimited refills of tea and coffee. Hot drinks will be available Wednesday 11am- 2pm
properties.title: Allenton Library

properties.description: We offer a warm space where families and individuals can come and enjoy a hot meal, conversation, activities, access free Wi-Fi and access to computers to support the with their digital skills.
properties.title: Derby COGOP

properties.description: The space is open to all on Wednesdays from 10am - 1.30pm. Hot drinks and cakes are provided free of charge all morning and a free warm lunch is provided after 12 noon. Games and puzzles are available to use and phones can be charged. People will need to bring their own charging cables though. Coats, and scarves will be available for people to take as they need them. On the last Thursday of each month, there is a 2-course community meal, again open to anyone, at 6pm. Spaces for this will need to be booked via derby.south@salvationarmy.org.uk or 01332 705588. We can signpost people to additional support regarding energy support schemes.
properties.title: Derby South Salvation Army (Allenton)
